Class Mailer

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.email.Mailer
Direct Known Subclasses:
MimeMailer
public abstract class Mailer
extends java.lang.Object

Base class for the various emailing implementations.

Since:
Ant 1.5
